node.title: Yes, Lord
node.description: God is compared to many things in the Bible. A shepherd, an eagle, a father, a mother, and even a lamb.  But when His people are in a state of utter rebellion and ruin, the prophet Jeremiah sees the Lord as a potter.  Teaching that God is molding our lives with His gentle hands of providence.  What if we become ruined in the process? What does the Potter do? Listen in for God's question, which is the answer..will you say "Yes, Lord?"
